(2799x243+227)/64 mod 512 = 391. (2799x729+745)/128 mod 256 = 75. (2799x2187+2363)/256 mod 128 = 113. (2799x6561+7345)/512 mod 64 = 42. (2799x6561+7345)/1024 mod 32 = 21. (2799x19683+23059)/2048 mod 16 = 0. (2799x19683+23059)/4096 mod 8 = 0. (2799x19683+23059)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (2799x19683+23059)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (2799x19683+23059)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
